Project Details

ClientCommercial

Project TypeUser Interface, iOS

Target DevicesMobile, iOS

View Project

Minimal & Beautiful

CATALYST is a minimal iOS Theme designed specifically for the iPhone 4’s Retina Display. Having always been a fan of minimalistic design, and also being a fan of tech customization, it was just a matter of time before I took my design skills and focused them towards iOS and UI design. CATALYST was my first, and arguably most successful, attempt at any UI design on iOS.

The Spec

CATALYST is for the iPhone 4 but it can be used on older generation iPhones, iPods as well as iPads. All native apps are skinned as well as a large number of third-party apps. It also includes a weather widget and calendar widget, both displayed on the offical website. (Click "View Project" on the right to see it.) Along with Apple sanctioned apps, Cydia and some of its most popular downloads are skinned.

Native Apps & UI Elements

Apple’s native applications all fit the minimal CATALYST theme. Applicationbadges are also skinned in a high-contrastblack design so you never miss your notifications again.

Cydia Packages

Cydia and some of its most popular packages are skinned under CATALYST. This number will be growing as more options become available to the public.

The Apps you know & love

The Apple iPhone is known for its fantastic form factor, amazing operating systems and, most of all, the incredible library of apps that we have come to love. CATALYST covers hundreds of these applications and has more added constantly. From productivity apps like OmniFocus, to music streaming apps like Rdio and Pandora, to social apps like Facebook, Twitter and Google+ - everything you know and love can fall within the gorgeous & minimalistic umbrella of CATALYST.
